verses.text: \w Stand|strong="G4739"\w* fast, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* held \w again|strong="G3825"\w* under \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w yoke|strong="G2218"\w* \w of|strong="G3588"\w* bondage.

\w Behold|strong="G2396"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w tell|strong="G3004"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w be|strong="G5547"\w* \w circumcised|strong="G4059"\w*, \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* shall \w profit|strong="G5623"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G3754"\w* \w testify|strong="G3143"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w to|strong="G3825"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* circumcising himself, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G3754"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* debtor \w to|strong="G3825"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*.

\w You|strong="G1722"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* made void \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w you|strong="G1722"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w justified|strong="G1344"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*: \w you|strong="G1722"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* fallen \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w in|strong="G4102"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w wait|strong="G0553"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G1537"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w justice|strong="G1343"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w* availeth \w any|strong="G5100"\w* thing, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w uncircumcision|strong="G0203"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w that|strong="G5100"\w* worketh \w by|strong="G1722"\w* charity.

\w You|strong="G5210"\w* \w did|strong="G2573"\w* \w run|strong="G5143"\w* \w well|strong="G2573"\w*, \w who|strong="G5101"\w* hath \w hindered|strong="G1465"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w that|strong="G3982"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* should \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w obey|strong="G3982"\w* \w the|strong="G5101"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*?
\w This|strong="G3588"\w* \w persuasion|strong="G3988"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w him|strong="G2564"\w* that calleth \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.
A \w little|strong="G3398"\w* \w leaven|strong="G2219"\w* corrupteth \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w lump|strong="G5445"\w*.

\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w confidence|strong="G3982"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*: \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G1510"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* \w mind|strong="G5426"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G3754"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* troubleth \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w shall|strong="G2962"\w* \w bear|strong="G0941"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2917"\w*, whosoever \w he|strong="G3754"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w yet|strong="G1161"\w* \w preach|strong="G2784"\w* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w*, \w why|strong="G5101"\w* \w do|strong="G5101"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w yet|strong="G1161"\w* suffer persecution? \w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w is|strong="G5101"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* scandal \w of|strong="G0080"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w cross|strong="G4716"\w* \w made|strong="G2784"\w* void.

\w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w would|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w cut|strong="G0609"\w* \w off|strong="G0609"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* trouble \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w have|strong="G3588"\w* \w been|strong="G1398"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* unto \w liberty|strong="G1657"\w*: \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w make|strong="G3361"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w liberty|strong="G1657"\w* \w an|strong="G2564"\w* \w occasion|strong="G0874"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* charity \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* spirit \w serve|strong="G1398"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w*: Thou shalt \w love|strong="G0025"\w* thy neighbour \w as|strong="G5613"\w* thyself.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w you|strong="G1487"\w* \w bite|strong="G1143"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w devour|strong="G2719"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*; \w take|strong="G0991"\w* \w heed|strong="G0991"\w* \w you|strong="G1487"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w consumed|strong="G0355"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*.

\w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w then|strong="G2532"\w*, \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G3004"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* fulfill \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w lusts|strong="G1939"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* lusteth \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w are|strong="G3778"\w* \w contrary|strong="G2596"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*: \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w you|strong="G3739"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w you|strong="G3739"\w* \w would|strong="G2309"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w you|strong="G1487"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w led|strong="G0071"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w you|strong="G1487"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w* \w of|strong="G2041"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* manifest, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w fornication|strong="G4202"\w*, \w uncleanness|strong="G0167"\w*, immodesty, luxury,
\w Idolatry|strong="G1495"\w*, witchcrafts, enmities, contentions, emulations, wraths, \w quarrels|strong="G2054"\w*, \w dissensions|strong="G1370"\w*, sects,

Envies, murders, \w drunkenness|strong="G3178"\w*, revellings, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* \w like|strong="G3664"\w*. \w Of|strong="G0932"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G3739"\w* foretell \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* foretold \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w they|strong="G3739"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w do|strong="G4238"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* obtain \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* \w of|strong="G0932"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w fruit|strong="G2590"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w*, charity, \w joy|strong="G5479"\w*, \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, \w patience|strong="G3115"\w*, benignity, \w goodness|strong="G0019"\w*, longanimity,

Mildness, faith, modesty, continency, chastity. \w Against|strong="G2596"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G1161"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w Christâ€™s|strong="G5547"\w*, \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* vices \w and|strong="G2532"\w* concupiscences.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w we|strong="G1487"\w* \w live|strong="G2198"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, let us \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w walk|strong="G4748"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*.

\w Let|strong="G1096"\w* us \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w made|strong="G1096"\w* desirous \w of|strong="G1096"\w* vain glory, \w provoking|strong="G4292"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*, \w envying|strong="G5354"\w* \w on|strong="G1096"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*.
